input.description: access key [Optional] The AWS access key.
secret key [Optional] The AWS secret access key.

session token [Optional] : The AWS session token which is generally created for temporary access to users for role based authorization.
Please Note: The temporary access key , secret key and session token to be generated by the user to provide in adapter request.
Please refer below AWS docs for more details
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_temp_request.html
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/sts/assume-role.html
region [Optional] The region to communicate with.

snapshot id [Mandatory]
The ID of the snapshot.

create volume permission [Optional]
Create volume permission element.
add - Adds permission remove - Removes permission user-id - User ID of a user that can create volumes from the snapshot group - Group that is allowed to create volumes from the snapshot (currently supports "all").
<create-volume-permission> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <add> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <user-id></user-id> <group></group> </item> </add>
<remove> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <user-id></user-id> <group></group> </item> </remove> </create-volume-permission>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <request-data> <amazon-ec2-rest-request> <xsl:if test="string-length('${access key}')>0"> <access-key>${access key}</access-key> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${secret key}')>0"> <secret-key>${secret key}</secret-key> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${session token}')>0 and string-length('${secret key}')>0 and string-length('${access key}')>0"> <session-token>${session token}</session-token> </xsl:if> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">modify-snapshot-attribute</xsl:text> </operation-name> <xsl:if test="string-length('${region}')>0"> <region>${region}</region> </xsl:if> <parameters> <snapshot-id>${snapshot id}</snapshot-id> ${create volume permission} </parameters> </amazon-ec2-rest-request> </request-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Adds or remove permission settings for the specified snapshot.
